00051     ///////////////////////////////////
00052     // ActorBase class fuctions
00053     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, World* _World)
00054     {
00055         this->GameWorld = _World;
00056         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00057         this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00058         //this->MotionState = new internal::PhysMotionState(this->node);
00059         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00060         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00061         MotionState = NULL;
00062         ActorSounds = NULL;
00063         Animation = NULL;
00064         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00065         ActorType = ActorBase::Actorbase;
00066     }
00067 
00068     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00069     {
00070         delete MotionState;
00071         if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00072         {
00073             delete Shape;
00074         }
00075         delete node;
00076         delete entity;
00077         if(CollisionObject)
00078         {
00079             delete CollisionObject;
00080         }
00081     }

00083     ///////////////////////////////////
00084     // ActorBase Private misc functions
00085     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh() const
00086     {
00087         // Get the mesh from the entity
00088         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00089 
00090         // Get the submesh and associated data
00091         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00092         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00093         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00094 
00095         // Get the position element
00096         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00097 
00098         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00099         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00100 
00101         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00102         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00103 
00104         // Get the number of triangles
00105         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00106 
00107         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00108         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00109         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00110 
00111         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00112         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00113         float* pReal = NULL;
00114         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00115         {
00116             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00117             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00118             vertices[j] = pt;
00119         }
00120         vBuffer->unlock();
00121         size_t index_offset = 0;
00122         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00123 
00124         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00125         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00126         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00127 
00128         if (use32bitindexes)
00129         {
00130             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00131             {
00132                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00133             }
00134         }
00135         else
00136         {
00137             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00138             {
00139                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00140             }
00141         }
00142         iBuffer->unlock();
00143 
00144         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00145 
00146         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00147         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00148 
00149         // Setup the tri mesh
00150         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00151         int i=0;
00152 
00153         // For every triangle
00154         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00155         {
00156             // Set each vertex
00157             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00158             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00159             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00160 
00161             // Add it into the trimesh
00162             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00163 
00164             // Increase index count
00165             i+=3;
00166         }
00167         delete[] vertices;
00168         delete[] indices;
00169 
00170         return trimesh;
00171     }

00173     void ActorBase::GetMeshVerticies (internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00174     {
00175         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00176         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00177         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00178 
00179         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00180         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00181 
00182         TheMesh.Verticies = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00183         TheMesh.VCount = vertexData->vertexCount;
00184 
00185         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00186         float* pReal = NULL;
00187         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00188         {
00189             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00190             TheMesh.Verticies[j].x = *pReal++;
00191             TheMesh.Verticies[j].y = *pReal++;
00192             TheMesh.Verticies[j].z = *pReal++;
00193         }
00194         vBuffer->unlock();
00195     }
00196 
00197     void ActorBase::GetMeshIndicies (internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00198     {
00199         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00200         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00201         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00202 
00203         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00204 
00205         TheMesh.Indicies = new int[indexData->indexCount];
00206         TheMesh.ICount = indexData->indexCount;
00207 
00208         size_t index_offset = 0;
00209         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00210 
00211         long* pLong = static_cast<long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00212         short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<short*>(pLong);
00213 
00214         if (use32bitindexes)
00215         {
00216             for (size_t k = 0; k < indexData->indexCount; ++k)
00217             {
00218                 TheMesh.Indicies[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00219             }
00220         }
00221         else
00222         {
00223             for (size_t k = 0; k < indexData->indexCount; ++k)
00224             {
00225                 TheMesh.Indicies[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00226             }
00227         }
00228         iBuffer->unlock();
00229     }

00232     {
00233         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00234         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00235         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;

00238         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00239 
00240         TheMesh.Normals = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00241 
00242         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00243         float* pReal = NULL;
00244         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00245         {
00246             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00247             TheMesh.Normals[j].x = *pReal++;
00248             TheMesh.Normals[j].y = *pReal++;

00254     void ActorBase::GetMeshTextures (internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00255     {
00256         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00257         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00258         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00259 
00260         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES);
00261         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00262 
00263         TheMesh.Textures = new Ogre::Vector2[vertexData->vertexCount];
00264 
00265         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00266         float* pReal = NULL;
00267         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00268         {
00269             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00270             TheMesh.Textures[j].x = *pReal++;
00271             TheMesh.Textures[j].y = *pReal++;
00272         }
00273         vBuffer->unlock();
00274     }
00275 
00276     void ActorBase::GetOtherMeshInfo(internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00277     {
00278         // Entity Name
00279         TheMesh.Name = entity->getName();
00280         // Material Name
00281         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00282         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00283         TheMesh.Material = subMesh->getMaterialName();
00284         // Material File Name
00285         Ogre::ResourcePtr Mat = ActorBase::GetOgreResourceManager()->_getResourceManager("Material")->getByName(TheMesh.Material);
00286         TheMesh.MaterialFile = Mat.getPointer()->getOrigin();
00287         // Group Name
00288         TheMesh.Group = ActorBase::GetOgreResourceManager()->findGroupContainingResource(TheMesh.MaterialFile);
00289         // Render Operation
00290         Ogre::RenderOperation Render;
00291         subMesh->_getRenderOperation(Render);
00292         TheMesh.RendOp = Render.operationType;
00293     }
00294 
00295     Ogre::ResourceGroupManager* ActorBase::GetOgreResourceManager()
00296     {
00297         return Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00298     }

00339     Vector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation() const
00340     {
00341         Vector3 temp;
00342         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00343         return temp;
00344     }

00346     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (Vector3 Location)
00347     {
00348         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00349         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00350     }

00352     Vector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation() const
00353     {

00355         //btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();

00421     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00422     {
00423         Vector3 tempv;
00424         Quaternion tempq;
00425         tempv = GetBulletLocation();
00426         tempq.ExtractBulletQuaternion(CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getRotation());
00427         this->node->setPosition(tempv.GetOgreVector3());
00428         this->node->setOrientation(tempq.GetOgreQuaternion());
00429         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00430     }
00431 
00432     void ActorBase::DetachFromGraphics ()
00433     {
00434         this->node->detachObject(this->entity);
00435     }
00436 
00437     void ActorBase::SetActorScaling(Vector3 scaling)
00438     {
00439         this->node->setScale(scaling.GetOgreVector3());
00440         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(scaling.GetBulletVector3());
00441     }

00459     void ActorBase::SetAnimation(String &AnimationName, bool Loop)
00460     {
00461         if(this->IsAnimated())
00462         {
00463             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00464         }
00465         Animation = entity->getAnimationState(AnimationName);
00466         Animation->setLoop(Loop);
00467     }
00468 
00469     void ActorBase::EnableAnimation(bool Enable)
00470     {
00471         if(Animation)
00472         {
00473             Animation->setEnabled(Enable);
00474         }
00475     }
00476 
00477     bool ActorBase::IsAnimated()
00478     {
00479         if(Animation)
00480         {
00481             return Animation->getEnabled();
00482         }else{
00483             return false;
00484         }
00485     }
00486 
00487     void ActorBase::AdvanceAnimation(Real Time)
00488     {
00489         if(Animation)
00490         {
00491             Animation->addTime(Time);
00492         }
00493     }
00494 
00495     void ActorBase::RemoveSetAnimation()
00496     {
00497         if(Animation)
00498         {
00499             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00500             Animation = NULL;
00501         }
00502     }

00525 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::ActorBase& x)
00526 {
00527     stream << "[" << x.GetName() << " at:" << x.GetLocation() << "]";
00528     return stream;
